contenido: Animal rights campaigners will increasingly take drastic measures to ensure their voices are heard, according to David Fisher. A night raid unfolds as farmers and scientists become targets in an intensified campaign of fear orchestrated by anti-vivisectionists and activists affiliated with the International Animal Liberation Front. Intelligence from a specialized police unit indicates that these groups are ramping up their activities. Over the past year, there have been death threats, vehicles painted with paint stripper, and break-ins.
